<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2820</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grandpa Henry and the Armchair traveller-student activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großvater-Henry und die Lehnsessel 
Reisend-Kursteilnehmer Aktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Henry de grand-papa et l'activité de 
voyageur-étudiant de fauteuil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Henry do grandpa e a atividade do 
traveller-estudante da poltrona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Henry del grandpa e l'attività 
dell'viaggiatore-allievo della poltrona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Grandpa Henry και η δραστηριότητα 
ταξιδιώτης-σπουδαστών πολυθρόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Henrio del grandpa y la actividad del 
viajero-estudiante de la butaca</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment of a reading comprehension and writing activity, where the student is required to answer questions in a letter and then write letters with descriptions of where they live.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sentences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung 
einer Leseerfassen- und -schreibensaktivität, in der der 
Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, Fragen in einem Zeichen zu beantworten 
und dann zu schreiben Briefe mit Beschreibungen von, denen sie leben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation 
d'une activité de compréhension et d'écriture de lecture, où 
l'étudiant est requis de répondre à des questions dans une lettre 
et puis d'écrire des lettres avec des descriptions d'où elles 
vivent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação 
de uma atividade da compreensão e da escrita da leitura, onde o 
estudante seja requerido responder a perguntas em uma letra e escrever
então letras com descrições de onde vivem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione di
un'attività di comprensione e di scrittura della lettura, dove 
l'allievo è tenuto a rispondere alle domande in una lettera ed allora
a scrivere le lettere con le descrizioni di dove vivono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
δραστηριότητας κατανόησης και γραψίματος ανάγνωσης, όπου ο 
σπουδαστής πρέπει για να απαντήσει στις ερωτήσεις σε μια επιστολή
και να γράψει έπειτα τις επιστολές με τις περιγραφές όπου ζουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen de
una actividad de la comprensión y de la escritura de la lectura, 
donde requieren al estudiante contestar a preguntas en una carta y 
después escribir letras con las descripciones de donde viven.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
